text:
如欲新增或變更發票資訊(如:公司統編、抬頭…)，請點選上方連結。
常見問題與解答
問題1：我什麼時候會收到電子發票？
答案：從2020年1月1日開始，在訂單完成扣款作業後，就會收到通知電子發票已開立的電子郵件。
問題2：我可以在電子發票上打統編嗎？
答案：電子發票無法打統編。 Agoda的住宿收據可作為您的住宿證明。
trans:
If you wish to add or change invoice information (e.g., company tax ID, title...), please click on the link above.
Frequently Asked Questions
Question 1: When will I receive my electronic invoice?
Answer: Starting from January 1, 2020, you will receive an email notification that the electronic invoice has been issued after the order payment is completed.
Question 2: Can I include the tax ID on the electronic invoice?
Answer: The tax ID cannot be included on the electronic invoice. Agoda's accommodation receipt can serve as your accommodation proof.
